name: Colaboratory
author: Colaboratory team
description: This allows Google Colaboratory to open and create files in Google Drive. It is automatically installed on first use; uninstalling this will not prevent access to Colaboratory.

name: DocHub - PDF Sign and Edit
author: DocHub
description: Sign PDF or document files, create forms and edit PDFs online for free!  Apply legally binding eSignatures, send (or receive) faxes, create reusable templates and more.

name: Lucidchart
author: Lucid Software
description: Collaborate on diagrams, such as flowcharts, wireframes, ERDs, and more.

name: Form Notifications
author: Google
description: Create and configure email notifications for response thresholds and Form respondents.

name: Magic Rainbow Unicorns Slides™
author: Dagmar Timler
description: Change boring font colours in your documents to a rainbow-tastic feast.

name: AppSheet
author: Google
description: AppSheet is the intelligent, no-code application development platform. With AppSheet, anyone can build and deploy mobile apps in minutes without code.

name: Adobe Acrobat: PDF edit, convert, sign tools
author: Adobe
description: Every PDF and e-sign tool you need, all in one place — embedded in Google Drive™.

name: Document Viewer for Drive™
author: documentviewer.herokuapp.com
description: This viewer lets you view document files (doc, xls, ppt, pdf, ai, psd, dxf, ps, zip, rar...) online without leaving your browser.

name: draw.io
author: JGraph Ltd
description: draw.io™ is an online diagramming application where you store your data in your choice of cloud storage.
